0.5.2.name: wordpress/usersidebarpanel
0.5.2.description:
This plugin add User Panel in your Sidebar, Local avatar and Notifications system

Support for English, Portuguese, Italian, Persian and Russian language

See http://krikun.ru/usersidebarpanel/

Last Chage:

  • Fix avatar system work in not root directory

  • Support for Persian language (big thx Mohsen Ghiasi)

  • Support for Italian language (big thx Gianni Diurno)

  • Support for Portuguese language (big thx Nuno dos Santos)

  • Notifications and comments/plugins counter in NewStyle Panel
